updates.Name: Updates page
updates.Description: +a page with bot updates has been added

updates.Name: /flags command
updates.Description: +/flags and /flags_answer commands have been added, which allow you to play a mini-game of guessing which flag belongs to which country

updates.Name: Auto vc update
updates.Description: the person who created the channel becomes its owner and can set the maximum number of people on the channel

updates.Name: Auto vc
updates.Description: A system for automatic creation of voice channels has been added
